properties.description: Counts of various variables in PROD.

content.query:
--Top Artist 
SELECT TOP (50) artist as 'Artist Name', COUNT(*) as 'Count of Top 50 Artist'
 FROM [spotifyprod].[playlist]
 GROUP BY [artist]--artist
 ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC;

--Genre
 SELECT TOP (132) CASE WHEN artist_genre is null then 'no genre' else artist_genre END as Genre, 
 COUNT(*) as 'Count'
 FROM [spotifyprod].[playlist]
 GROUP BY [artist_genre]--artist
 ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC;
